status.Description: The status of the blueprint. This field is readonly.

targetScope.Description: The scope where this Blueprint can be applied. Possible values include: 'subscription', 'managementGroup'

parameters.Description: A dictionary hold parameter name and it's metadata.

resourceGroups.Description: A dictionary which maps resource group placeholders to the resource groups which will be created.

layout.Description: Layout view of the blueprint, for UI reference.

lastModified.Description: Last modified time of this blueprint.

type.Description: Allowed data types for Azure Resource Manager template parameters. Possible values include: 'string', 'array', 'bool', 'int', 'object', 'secureObject', 'secureString'

allowedValues.Description: Array of allowed values for this parameter.

strongType.Description: StrongType for UI to render rich experience during assignment time.

name.Description: Name of this resourceGroup, leave empty if the resource group name will be specified during the Blueprint assignment.

location.Description: Location of this resourceGroup, leave empty if the resource group location will be specified during the Blueprint assignment.

dependsOn.Description: Artifacts which need to be deployed before this resource group.

kind.Description: Blueprint artifact deploys Azure resource manager template.

dependsOn.Description: Artifacts which need to be deployed before the specified artifact.

template.Description: The Azure Resource Manager template body.

resourceGroup.Description: If applicable, the name of the resource group placeholder to which the template will be deployed.

parameters.Description: A dictionary for parameters and their corresponding values.

description.Description: Optional property, just to establish ParameterValueBase as a BaseClass.

properties.Description: Properties of the Role assignment artifact.

kind.Description: Blueprint artifact applies Azure role assignment.

dependsOn.Description: Artifacts which need to be deployed before the specified artifact.

roleDefinitionId.Description: Azure resource ID of the RoleDefinition.

principalIds.Description: Array of user or group identities in Azure Active Directory. The roleDefinition will apply to these identity.

resourceGroup.Description: RoleAssignment will be scope to this resourceGroup, if left empty, it would scope to the subscription.

dependsOn.Description: Artifacts which need to be deployed before the specified artifact.

policyDefinitionId.Description: Azure resource ID of the policy definition.

parameters.Description: A dictionary for parameters and their corresponding values.

resourceGroup.Description: Name of the resource group placeholder to which the policy will be assigned.

status.Description: The status of the blueprint. This field is readonly.

targetScope.Description: The scope where this Blueprint can be applied. Possible values include: 'subscription', 'managementGroup'

parameters.Description: A dictionary hold parameter name and it's metadata.

resourceGroups.Description: A dictionary which maps resource group placeholders to the resource groups which will be created.

location.Description: The location of this Blueprint assignment.

type.Description: Type of the Managed Service Identity. Possible values include: 'None', 'SystemAssigned', 'UserAssigned'

principalId.Description: Azure Active Directory principal ID associated with this Identity.

tenantId.Description: ID of the Azure Active Directory.

blueprintId.Description: ID of the Blueprint definition resource.

parameters.Description: A dictionary for parameters and their corresponding values.

resourceGroups.Description: A dictionary which maps resource group placeholders to the resource groups which will be created.

status.Description: The status of Blueprint assignment. This field is readonly.

locks.Description: Defines how Blueprint-managed resources will be locked.

provisioningState.Description: State of the assignment. Possible values include: 'creating', 'validating', 'waiting', 'deploying', 'cancelling', 'locking', 'succeeded', 'failed', 'canceled', 'deleting'

lastModified.Description: Last modified time of this blueprint.
